title: To the Moon and Back
description: Sophie Watters not only has a secret, she is a secret.For two years Sophie Watters has been able to hide the fact that she is engaged to Mega Superstar Geoff Mann, and has stayed only a rumor to a world that is dying to know everything about her. That was until her twenty first birthday when she woke up to find a picture of her and Geoff on the cover of every magazine.Faced with the challenge of her new found celebrity life Sophie soon realizes what it feels like to live in the spotlight as she watches a life she once loved fade away.Will Sophieâ€™s love for Geoff be strong enough for her to hold on, or will she leave her heart behind to return to the only life she knew?
author: Jayme Ardente Silliman
